trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code (GDIP_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code (GDIP_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: The value of the count parameter must equal 3 to specify the coordinates of the upper-left corner, upper-right corner, and lower-left corner of the parallelogram.

seg-source.mrk: The value of the count parameter must equal 3 to specify the coordinates of the upper-left corner, upper-right corner, and lower-left corner of the parallelogram.

target.mrk: The value of the count parameter must equal 3 to specify the coordinates of the upper-left corner, upper-right corner, and lower-left corner of the parallelogram.

trans-unit.source: The coordinate of the lower-right corner, the width, and the height of the image, are calculated using the three given coordinates.

seg-source.mrk: The coordinate of the lower-right corner, the width, and the height of the image, are calculated using the three given coordinates.

target.mrk: The coordinate of the lower-right corner, the width, and the height of the image, are calculated using the three given coordinates.

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the parallelogram.

target.mrk: The image is scaled to fit the parallelogram.
